mapper.select: SELECT ID, SKU_CODE as skuCode, OUTER_SKU_CODE as outerSkuCode, OUTER_CODE as outerCode FROM WMS_SKU_MAP WHERE SKU_CODE = #{skuCode} AND OUTER_CODE = #{outerCode}
SELECT ID, SKU_CODE as skuCode, OUTER_SKU_CODE as outerSkuCode, OUTER_CODE as outerCode FROM WMS_SKU_MAP WHERE OUTER_SKU_CODE = #{outerSkuCode} AND OUTER_CODE = #{outerCode}
mapper.insert:
select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into WMS_SKU_MAP (ID, SKU_CODE, OUTER_SKU_CODE, OUTER_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outerSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into WMS_SKU_MAP
ID,
SKU_CODE,
OUTER_SKU_CODE,
OUTER_CODE,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outerSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WMS_SKU_MAP
SKU_CODE = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUTER_SKU_CODE = #{outerSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUTER_CODE = #{outerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_PUSH_STATUS = #{skuPushStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
